text: Spoke with Prime Minister @GiuseppeConteIT yesterday afternoon. About recovery and the Italian reform plans after the devastating #COVID19 pandemic. For a strong EU we need strong Member States. I therefore welcome the confidence-inspiring step taken by Prime Minister Conte.
